docs.lead_paragraph: Restaurants and shops began reopening on Sunday in parts of West Virginia where the water supply was poisoned by a chemical spill, although up to 300,000 people spent a fourth day unable to use tap water for anything besides flushing toilets.

headline.main: Restaurants Reopen With Bottled Water After West Virginia Spill
headline.print_headline: Restaurants Reopen With Bottled Water After West Virginia Spill

docs.snippet: Restaurants and shops began reopening on Sunday in parts of West Virginia where the water supply was poisoned by a chemical spill, although up to 300,000 people spent a fourth day unable to use tap water for anything besides flushing toilets.

docs.lead_paragraph: Eleanor McCullen clutches a baby's hat knit in pink and blue as she patrols a yellow semicircle painted on the sidewalk outside a Planned Parenthood health clinic on a frigid December morning with snow in the forecast.

headline.main: High Court Case: Abortion Clinic Protest-Free Zone
headline.print_headline: High Court Case: Abortion Clinic Protest-Free Zone

docs.snippet: Eleanor McCullen clutches a baby's hat knit in pink and blue as she patrols a yellow semicircle painted on the sidewalk outside a Planned Parenthood health clinic on a frigid December morning with snow in the forecast.
